issue.title: [C++] Implement optimizations for dictionary unification where dictionaries are prefixes of the unified dictionary
issue.body:
***Note**: This issue was originally created as [ARROW-4095](https://issues.apache.org/jira/browse/ARROW-4095). Please see the [migration documentation](https://gist.github.com/toddfarmer/12aa88361532d21902818a6044fda4c3) for further details.*

### Original Issue Description:
In the event that the unified dictionary contains other dictionaries as prefixes (e.g. as the result of delta dictionaries), we can avoid memory allocation and index transposition.

See discussion at 

https://github.com/apache/arrow/pull/3165#discussion_r243020982

comments.body:
***Note**: [Comment](https://issues.apache.org/jira/browse/ARROW-4095?focusedCommentId=16920023) by Micah Kornfield (emkornfield@gmail.com):*
Issue resolved by pull request 5230
<https://github.com/apache/arrow/pull/5230>
